tag.name: GA4 - Event - javascript_error
tag.notes: This tag measures JavaScript errors and links to Google Analytics 4.

tag.name: GA4 - Event - view_404
tag.notes: This tag measures the amount of unknown pages (404 error) appear to the visitors and is linked to Google Analytics 4.

<script type="text/javascript">

  window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];

  window._sqzl.push({
    "event"                : "AddToCart",
    "products"             : {{cjs - SQ viewcontent}}
  });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
    // Push the PageView event with customerGroup to the Squeezely tracker
    window._sqzl.push({
        "event": "PageView",
        "custom_customer_group": {{cjs - customer_group}}
    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
  
  window._sqzl.push({
    "event"                : "Purchase",
    "email"                : "{{DLV - customerEmail}}",
    "firstname"            : "{{DLV - firstname}}",
    "lastname"             : "{{DLV - lastname}}",
    "orderid"              : "{{DLV - ecommerce.transaction_id}}",
    "products"             : {{cjs - items_array_spotler}}
  });
</script>

<script>
(function() {
var timeout = 700; // Milliseconds - change to what you want the timeout to be.
    window.setTimeout(function() {
        window.dataLayer.push({
            'event': 'consentSelected'
        });
    }, timeout);
})();
</script>

tag.name: SQ - Email Interaction - Not Subscribed Listener

parameter.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
    var formDataArray = {{cjs - CreateAccount FormData}};
    
    // Helper function to get value by field name
    function getFieldValue(fieldName) {
        for (var i = 0; i < formDataArray.length; i++) {
            if (formDataArray[i].field === fieldName) {
                return formDataArray[i].value;
            }
        }
        return ""; // Return an empty string if the field is not found
    }

    // Retrieve email from form data
    var email = getFieldValue("email");
    var emailOptin = getFieldValue("isSubscribed");

    // Select the password confirmation field by its ID
    var passwordConfirmation = document.getElementById("password-confirmation");

    if (passwordConfirmation) {
        // Add a click event listener to the password confirmation field
        passwordConfirmation.addEventListener("click", function() {
            // Check if the emailOptin status is "no"
                if (emailOptin === "no") {
                    window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
                    window._sqzl.push({
                        "event": "CreateAccountWithoutSubscription",
                        "email": email
                    });
                }
        });
    }
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var formDataArray = {{cjs - CreateAccount FormData}};
    window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];

// Helper function to get value by field name
    function getFieldValue(fieldName) {
        for (var i = 0; i < formDataArray.length; i++) {
            if (formDataArray[i].field === fieldName) {
                return formDataArray[i].value;
            }
        }
        return ""; // Return an empty string if the field is not found
    }

    // Extract firstname and lastname
    var firstname = getFieldValue("firstName");
    var lastname = getFieldValue("lastName");
    var dob = getFieldValue("dob");
    var email = getFieldValue("email");
    var emailOptin = getFieldValue("isSubscribed");

    // Push the CreateAccount event with firstname and lastname to the Squeezely tracker
    window._sqzl.push({
        "event": "CreateAccount",
        "firstname": firstname,
        "lastname": lastname,
        "birthdate": dob,
        "email": email,
        "newsletter": emailOptin,
        "marketing": emailOptin,
        "service": emailOptin
    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  
    var formDataArray = {{cjs - Purchase FormData}};
    window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];

// Helper function to get value by field name
    function getFieldValue(fieldName) {
        for (var i = 0; i < formDataArray.length; i++) {
            if (formDataArray[i].field === fieldName) {
                return formDataArray[i].value;
            }
        }
        return ""; // Return an empty string if the field is not found
    }

    // Extract firstname and lastname
    var firstname = getFieldValue("firstName");
    var lastname = getFieldValue("lastName");
    var email = getFieldValue("email");
    var telephone = getFieldValue("telephone");
    var postcode = getFieldValue("postcode");
    var city = getFieldValue("city");
    var country = getFieldValue("country_id");

  
  window._sqzl.push({
    "event"                 : "Checkout3PaymentView",
    "email"                 : email,
    "first name"            : firstname,
    "last name"             : lastname,
    "phone"                 : telephone,
    "postcode"              : postcode,
    "city"                  : city,
    "country"               : country,
    "custom_customer_group" : {{cjs - customer_group}}
  });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  
  window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
  window._sqzl.push({
    "event"                 : "Checkout2ShippingView",
    "email"                 : {{DLV - customerEmail}},
    "first_name"            : {{DLV - firstname}},
    "last_name"             : {{DLV - lastname}},
    "custom_customer_group" : {{cjs - customer_group}}
  });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
  window._sqzl.push({
    "event"                : "Checkout1CartView",
    "products"             : {{cjs - items_array_spotler}},
    "custom_customer_group": {{cjs - customer_group}}
  });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var formDataArray = {{cjs - AccountNewsletterFormData}};
    window._sqzl = window._sqzl || [];
    
  // Helper function to get value by field name
    function getFieldValue(fieldName) {
        for (var i = 0; i < formDataArray.length; i++) {
            if (formDataArray[i].field === fieldName) {
                return formDataArray[i].value;
            }
        }
        return ""; // Return an empty string if the field is not found
    }
  
    var email = getFieldValue("email");
    var newsletter = getFieldValue("isSubscribed");

    window._sqzl.push({
        "event": "AccountNewsletterSubscriptionUpdate",
        "email" : email,
        "newsletter": newsletter,
        "marketing": newsletter
    });
</script>

customTemplate.templateData:
___TERMS_OF_SERVICE___

By creating or modifying this file you agree to Google Tag Manager's Community
Template Gallery Developer Terms of Service available at
https://developers.google.com/tag-manager/gallery-tos (or such other URL as
Google may provide), as modified from time to time.


___INFO___

{
  "type": "TAG",
  "categories": [
    "ADVERTISING"
  ],
  "id": "cvt_temp_public_id",
  "version": 1,
  "securityGroups": [],
  "displayName": "Criteo OneTag - Official",
  "brand": {
    "id": "github.com_criteo",
    "displayName": "criteo",
    "thumbnail": "data:image/png;base64,"
  },
  "description": "Tag that sends your users\u0027 event data from your website to Criteo. IMPORTANT: For this tag to function, the \u0027Criteo Loader\u0027 tag needs to be implemented on all your website\u0027s pages.",
  "containerContexts": [
    "WEB"
  ]
}


___TEMPLATE_PARAMETERS___

[
  {
    "type": "GROUP",
    "name": "partner",
    "displayName": "Partner",
    "groupStyle": "ZIPPY_OPEN",
    "subParams": [
      {
        "type": "SELECT",
        "name": "partnerType",
        "displayName": "Partner Type",
        "macrosInSelect": false,
        "selectItems": [
          {
            "value": "partnerId",
            "displayValue": "Partner ID (Recommended)"
          },
          {
            "value": "customPartner",
            "displayValue": "Custom Partner"
          }
        ],
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "defaultValue": "partnerId"
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "partnerId",
        "displayName": "Partner ID",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "Your unique Criteo Partner ID. If using several Partner IDs,  they need to be separated by commas or passed in an array.",
        "alwaysInSummary": true,
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "partnerType",
            "paramValue": "partnerId",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "GROUP",
        "name": "customPartner",
        "displayName": "Custom Partner",
        "groupStyle": "NO_ZIPPY",
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "applicationName",
            "displayName": "Application Name",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "valueValidators": [
              {
                "type": "NON_EMPTY"
              }
            ]
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "country",
            "displayName": "Country",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "valueValidators": [
              {
                "type": "NON_EMPTY"
              }
            ]
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "language",
            "displayName": "Language",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "valueValidators": [
              {
                "type": "NON_EMPTY"
              }
            ]
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "partnerType",
            "paramValue": "customPartner",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "GROUP",
    "name": "event",
    "displayName": "Event",
    "groupStyle": "ZIPPY_OPEN",
    "subParams": [
      {
        "type": "SELECT",
        "name": "type",
        "displayName": "Type",
        "macrosInSelect": false,
        "selectItems": [
          {
            "value": "viewPage",
            "displayValue": "Page View"
          },
          {
            "value": "viewHome",
            "displayValue": "Homepage"
          },
          {
            "value": "viewList",
            "displayValue": "Listing Page"
          },
          {
            "value": "viewItem",
            "displayValue": "Product Page"
          },
          {
            "value": "viewBasket",
            "displayValue": "Basket Page"
          },
          {
            "value": "addToCart",
            "displayValue": "Add to Basket"
          },
          {
            "value": "trackTransaction",
            "displayValue": "Conversion"
          },
          {
            "value": "viewStore",
            "displayValue": "Store View"
          },
          {
            "value": "setStore",
            "displayValue": "Recommended Store"
          },
          {
            "value": "reserveInStore",
            "displayValue": "Reserve Product in Store"
          },
          {
            "value": "checkAvailability",
            "displayValue": "Check Product Availability"
          }
        ],
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "defaultValue": "viewPage",
        "notSetText": "",
        "valueValidators": [
          {
            "type": "NON_EMPTY"
          }
        ],
        "alwaysInSummary": false
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "item",
        "displayName": "Product ID",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "viewItem",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          },
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "reserveInStore",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          },
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "checkAvailability",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ],
        "valueValidators": [
          {
            "type": "NON_EMPTY"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "transaction_id",
        "displayName": "Transaction ID",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "trackTransaction",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ],
        "valueValidators": [
          {
            "type": "NON_EMPTY"
          }
        ],
        "help": "Confirmation or Order #"
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "basket",
        "displayName": "Basket",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "viewBasket",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          },
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "trackTransaction",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          },
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "addToCart",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ],
        "valueValidators": [
          {
            "type": "NON_EMPTY"
          }
        ],
        "help": "List of products in the user\u0027s basket (array or JSON string).\nExample: [{\"id\": \"a123\", \"price\": 475, \"quantity\": 1}]"
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "availability",
        "displayName": "Availability (Optional)",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "Product availability status (true of false).",
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "viewItem",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "price",
        "displayName": "Price (Optional)",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "viewItem",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "GROUP",
        "name": "viewListParams",
        "groupStyle": "NO_ZIPPY",
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "list",
            "displayName": "Products list",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "enablingConditions": [],
            "valueValidators": [
              {
                "type": "NON_EMPTY"
              }
            ],
            "alwaysInSummary": true,
            "help": "List of Product IDs viewed by the user (array or JSON string).\nExample: [\"a123\", \"b456\", \"c789\"]"
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "keywords",
            "displayName": "Keywords (Optional)",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "help": "Keywords searched by the user (string)",
            "enablingConditions": [],
            "valueHint": "red shoes"
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "category",
            "displayName": "Category (Optional)",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "help": "Category of the page. This value should match the category values sent in your product catalog. (string)",
            "enablingConditions": []
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "page_number",
            "displayName": "Page Number (Optional)",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "enablingConditions": []
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "filters",
            "displayName": "Filters (Optional)",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "enablingConditions": [],
            "help": "Filters applied (array of objects)\nExample: [{name: \"brand\", operator: \"eq\", value: \"First Brand, Second Brand\"}]"
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "viewList",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "currency",
        "displayName": "Currency Code (Optional)",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "viewBasket",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          },
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "trackTransaction",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          },
          {
            "paramName": "type",
            "paramValue": "addToCart",
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ],
        "help": "3-letter currency code (string). Example: \"USD\"",
        "valueHint": "USD"
      },
      {
        "type": "CHECKBOX",
        "name": "advanced_event_options",
        "checkboxText": "Advanced options",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "CHECKBOX",
            "name": "manualDising",
            "checkboxText": "Manual DIS",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "enablingConditions": [
              {
                "paramName": "advanced_event_options",
                "paramValue": true,
                "type": "EQUALS"
              }
            ],
            "help": "Will prevent Criteo\u0027s automatic Dynamic Inventory Selection"
          }
        ],
        "help": "Please get in touch with your Criteo representative before using these options"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "GROUP",
    "name": "userIdentifiers",
    "displayName": "User Identifiers",
    "groupStyle": "ZIPPY_OPEN_ON_PARAM",
    "subParams": [
      {
        "type": "PARAM_TABLE",
        "name": "emails",
        "displayName": "Emails",
        "paramTableColumns": [
          {
            "param": {
              "type": "TEXT",
              "name": "email",
              "displayName": "Hashed Email",
              "simpleValueType": true
            },
            "isUnique": true
          },
          {
            "param": {
              "type": "SELECT",
              "name": "hash_method",
              "displayName": "Hash Method",
              "macrosInSelect": false,
              "selectItems": [
                {
                  "value": "",
                  "displayValue": "None"
                },
                {
                  "value": "md5",
                  "displayValue": "MD5"
                },
                {
                  "value": "sha256",
                  "displayValue": "SHA-256"
                },
                {
                  "value": "sha256_md5",
                  "displayValue": "SHA-256(MD5)"
                }
              ],
              "simpleValueType": true
            },
            "isUnique": true
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": []
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "visitorId",
        "displayName": "Visitor ID",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "A unique ID that is consistent during sessions on the same device. Example: Google Analytics ID"
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "customerId",
        "displayName": "Customer ID",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "A non PII value that can identify a unique user in a CRM. Must be hashed. Examples: hashed CRM id, hashed user login."
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "gaid",
        "displayName": "Google Advertising ID (GAID)",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "Android device advertising identifier"
      },
      {
        "type": "TEXT",
        "name": "idfa",
        "displayName": "Identifier for Advertisers (IDFA)",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "Apple device advertising identifier"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "GROUP",
    "name": "extraParameters",
    "displayName": "Extra Parameters",
    "groupStyle": "ZIPPY_OPEN_ON_PARAM",
    "subParams": [
      {
        "type": "CHECKBOX",
        "name": "location",
        "checkboxText": "Use Location Parameters",
        "simpleValueType": true
      },
      {
        "type": "CHECKBOX",
        "name": "travel",
        "checkboxText": "Use Travel Parameters",
        "simpleValueType": true
      },
      {
        "type": "CHECKBOX",
        "name": "store",
        "checkboxText": "Use Store Parameters",
        "simpleValueType": true
      },
      {
        "type": "CHECKBOX",
        "name": "custom",
        "checkboxText": "Use Custom Parameters",
        "simpleValueType": true
      },
      {
        "type": "GROUP",
        "name": "locationParameters",
        "displayName": "Location Parameters",
        "groupStyle": "NO_ZIPPY",
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "zipcode",
            "displayName": "Zipcode",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "help": "Zip code of the shipping address. Value is hashed before being stored in Criteo\u0027s database. Criteo does not store any PII and is compliant with all local regulations."
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "location",
            "paramValue": true,
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "GROUP",
        "name": "travelParameters",
        "displayName": "Travel Parameters",
        "groupStyle": "NO_ZIPPY",
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "din",
            "displayName": "Check-in Date",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "valueHint": "yyyy-MM-dd",
            "help": "Check-in / Departure date selected by the user"
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "dout",
            "displayName": "Check-out Date",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "valueHint": "yyyy-MM-dd",
            "help": "Check-out / Return date selected by the user"
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "nbra",
            "displayName": "Number of adults",
            "simpleValueType": true
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "nbrc",
            "displayName": "Number of children",
            "simpleValueType": true
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "nbri",
            "displayName": "Number of infants",
            "simpleValueType": true
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "nbrr",
            "displayName": "Number of rooms",
            "simpleValueType": true
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "travel",
            "paramValue": true,
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "GROUP",
        "name": "storeParameters",
        "displayName": "Store Parameters",
        "groupStyle": "NO_ZIPPY",
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "store_id",
            "displayName": "Store ID",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "help": "Unique physical store ID"
          },
          {
            "type": "TEXT",
            "name": "store_sale",
            "displayName": "Is Store Sale",
            "simpleValueType": true,
            "enablingConditions": [
              {
                "paramName": "type",
                "paramValue": "trackTransaction",
                "type": "EQUALS"
              }
            ],
            "help": "true if the sale will be picked up in a physical store (Click \u0026 Collect). Otherwise, false."
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "store",
            "paramValue": true,
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      },
      {
        "type": "GROUP",
        "name": "customParameters",
        "displayName": "Custom Parameters",
        "groupStyle": "NO_ZIPPY",
        "subParams": [
          {
            "type": "PARAM_TABLE",
            "name": "params",
            "displayName": "",
            "paramTableColumns": [
              {
                "param": {
                  "type": "TEXT",
                  "name": "key",
                  "displayName": "Key",
                  "simpleValueType": true
                },
                "isUnique": true
              },
              {
                "param": {
                  "type": "TEXT",
                  "name": "value",
                  "displayName": "Value",
                  "simpleValueType": true
                },
                "isUnique": false
              }
            ]
          }
        ],
        "enablingConditions": [
          {
            "paramName": "custom",
            "paramValue": true,
            "type": "EQUALS"
          }
        ]
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "type": "GROUP",
    "name": "advancedSettings",
    "displayName": "Debug Mode",
    "groupStyle": "ZIPPY_OPEN_ON_PARAM",
    "subParams": [
      {
        "type": "CHECKBOX",
        "name": "debug_mode",
        "checkboxText": "Activate debug mode",
        "simpleValueType": true,
        "help": "Activating the debug mode will log the Criteo events in the browser\u0027s console for troubleshooting purposes."
      }
    ]
  }
]


___SANDBOXED_JS_FOR_WEB_TEMPLATE___

const JSON = require('JSON');
const log = require('logToConsole');
const setInWindow = require('setInWindow');
const copyFromWindow = require('copyFromWindow');
const makeInteger = require('makeInteger');
const makeNumber = require('makeNumber');
const makeString = require('makeString');

var storeEvents = ["viewStore", "setStore", "reserveInStore", "checkAvailability"];
var isStoreEvent = storeEvents.indexOf(data.type)!=-1;

function to_array(my_var){
    let arr;
    if(typeof(my_var) === "string")
      arr = JSON.parse(my_var);
    return arr || my_var;
}

if(data.debug_mode){
  log("--- Criteo OneTag Start ---");
  log(data);
}

// Init
let criteo_q = copyFromWindow("criteo_q") || [];
var events = [];

// setAccount
var evt = {event: "setAccount"};
var account = null;
if(data.partnerType === "customPartner"){  
  account = {
    an: data.applicationName,
    cn: data.country,
    ln: data.language
  };
}
else{ 
  if (typeof data.partnerId === 'string')
    account = data.partnerId.replace(" ", "").split(",");
  else
    account = data.partnerId;
}

evt.account = account;
events.push(evt);

// setSiteType
if(!data.gaid && !data.idfa)
  events.push({ event: "setSiteType", type: "d"});

// Main Event
var evt_type = data.type;

if(evt_type){
  evt = {event: evt_type, "tms": "gtm-template"};
  if(data.type == "viewList"){
    if(data.keywords)
      evt.keywords = data.keywords;
    if(data.category)
      evt.category = data.category;
    if(data.page_number)
      evt.page_number = makeInteger(data.page_number);
    if(data.filters)
      evt.filters = data.filters;
  }

  if(data.type == "viewItem"){
    if(data.availability)
      evt.availability = !!data.availability;
    if(data.price)
      evt.price = makeNumber(data.price);
  }

  if(data.type == "trackTransaction"){
    evt.id = data.transaction_id;
    if(!!data.store_sale){
      evt.user_segment = 18;
      evt.delivery = "store";
      if(data.store_id)
        evt.store_id = data.store_id;
      if(data.zipcode)
        evt.zipcode = data.zipcode;
    }
  }
  
  if(isStoreEvent){
    if(data.store_id)
      evt.store_id = data.store_id;
    if(data.zipcode)
      evt.zipcode = data.zipcode;
    evt.user_segment = 18;  
  }
  
  if(data.custom){
    var custom_params = data.params;
    for(var i=0; i<custom_params.length; i++){
      var param = custom_params[i];
      var key = param.key;
      var value = param.value;  
  
      evt[key] = value;  
    }
  }
  
  if(data.currency)
    evt.currency = data.currency;
  
  if(data.item)
    evt.item = data.item;
  if(data.list)
    evt.item = to_array(data.list);
  if(data.basket)
    evt.item = to_array(data.basket);
  
  events.push(evt);
}

// Advanced event options
if(data.advanced_event_options){
  if(data.manualDising){
    evt = {event: "manualDising"};
    events.push(evt);
  }
}

// User Identifiers
if(data.visitorId){
  evt = {event: "setRetailerVisitorId", id: data.visitorId};
  events.push(evt);
}

if(data.customerId){
  evt = {event: "setCustomerId", id: data.customerId};
  events.push(evt);
}

if(data.gaid){
  evt = {event: "setGoogleAdvertisingId", gaid: data.gaid};
  events.push(evt);
}

if(data.idfa){
  evt = {event: "setAppleAdvertisingId", idfa: data.idfa};
  events.push(evt);
}

if (data.emails){
  for(var i=0; i<data.emails.length; i++){
    var email = data.emails[i].email;
    var hash_method = data.emails[i].hash_method; 
        
    if(email){
      var evt = {event: "setEmail"};    
      evt.email = email;
      
      if(hash_method)
        evt.hash_method = hash_method;
      
      events.push(evt);
    }
  }
}

// Travel Parameters
if(data.travel)
{
  evt = {event: "viewSearch"};
  if(data.dout)
    evt.dout = data.dout;
  if(data.din)
    evt.din = data.din;
  if(data.nbra)
    evt.nbra = makeInteger(data.nbra);
  if(data.nbrc)
    evt.nbrc = makeInteger(data.nbrc);
  if(data.nbri)
    evt.nbri = makeInteger(data.nbri);
  if(data.nbrr)
    evt.nbrr = makeInteger(data.nbrr);
  events.push(evt);
}

// Store Parameters
if(data.store || data.location)
{
  if(!isStoreEvent && !data.store_sale){
    if(data.zipcode){
      evt = {event: "setZipcode"};
      evt.zipcode = data.zipcode;
      events.push(evt);
    }
    if(data.store_id){
      evt = {event: "viewStore"};
      evt.store_id = data.store_id;
      events.push(evt);
    }
  }  
}


criteo_q.push(
	events[0],
	events[1],
	events[2],
	events[3],
	events[4],
	events[5],
	events[6],
	events[7],
	events[8],
	events[9],
	events[10],
	events[11],
	events[12],
  { event: "flushEvents"}
);

setInWindow("criteo_q", criteo_q, true);

if(data.debug_mode){
  log(events);
  log("--- Criteo OneTag End ---");
}

// Call data.gtmOnSuccess when the tag is finished.
data.gtmOnSuccess();

return events;


___WEB_PERMISSIONS___

___TESTS___

scenarios:
- name: setAccount - Empty Partner ID
  code: |-
    const mockData = {partnerType: "partnerId"};
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    // Check that there the account passed to the setAccount event is undefined
    var setAccount = getEvent(events, "setAccount");
    assertThat(setAccount.account).isUndefined();

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: setAccount - Comma separated partner ID list
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
      partnerType: "partnerId",
      partnerId: "1234, 5678"
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var setAccount = getEvent(events, "setAccount");
    assertThat(setAccount.account).isEqualTo(["1234","5678"]);

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: setAccount - partner ID array
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
      partnerType: "partnerId",
      partnerId: [0, 1]
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var setAccount = getEvent(events, "setAccount");
    assertThat(setAccount.account).isEqualTo(mockData.partnerId);

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();

    var event = getEvent(events, "viewPage");
    assertThat(event).isDefined();

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.

- name: viewList - Base
  code: "const mockData = {\ntype: \"viewList\",\nlist: [1,2,3,4] \n};\nvar events\
    \ = runCode(mockData);\n\nvar event = getEvent(events, \"viewList\");\nassertThat(event).isDefined();\n\
    assertThat(event.item).isEqualTo(mockData.list);\n\n// Verify that the tag finished\
    \ successfully.\nassertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();"
- name: viewList - JSON Item list

    type: "viewList",
    list: "[1,2,3,4]"
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var event = getEvent(events, "viewList");
    assertThat(event).isDefined();
    assertThat(event.item).isEqualTo(JSON.parse(mockData.list));

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: viewItem - Base

    item: "product_id"
    };

    var event = getEvent(events, "viewItem");
    assertThat(event).isDefined();
    assertThat(event.item).isEqualTo(mockData.item);

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();

  code: |-
    require('JSON');

    const mockData = {
        type: "viewBasket",
        basket: '[{"id": "product_id", "quantity": 3, "price": 15.2}]'
    };

- name: trackTransaction - Base
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
    type: "trackTransaction",
    transaction_id: "1234",
    basket: [{id: "product_id", quantity: 3, price: 15.2}]
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var event = getEvent(events, "trackTransaction");
    assertThat(event).isDefined();
    assertThat(event.id).isEqualTo(mockData.transaction_id);

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.

    };

    var event = getEvent(events, "viewStore");
    assertThat(event).isDefined();
    assertThat(event.user_segment).isEqualTo(18);

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: viewHome - Zipcode - No Store Parameter
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
    type: "viewHome",
    location: true,
    store: true,
    zipcode: 1234
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var viewHome_event = getEvent(events, "viewHome");
    var setZipcode_event = getEvent(events, "setZipcode");
    assertThat(viewHome_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(setZipcode_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(setZipcode_event.zipcode).isEqualTo(mockData.zipcode);

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: viewHome - IDFA
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
    type: "viewHome",
    idfa: "ABCD"
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var viewHome_event = getEvent(events, "viewHome");
    var setAppleAdvertisingId_event = getEvent(events, "setAppleAdvertisingId");
    var setSiteType_event = getEvent(events, "setSiteType");
    assertThat(viewHome_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(setAppleAdvertisingId_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(setAppleAdvertisingId_event.idfa).isEqualTo(mockData.idfa);
    assertThat(setSiteType_event).isUndefined();

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: viewHome - GAID
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
    type: "viewHome",
    gaid: "ABCD"
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var viewHome_event = getEvent(events, "viewHome");
    var setGoogleAdvertisingId_event = getEvent(events, "setGoogleAdvertisingId");
    var setSiteType_event = getEvent(events, "setSiteType");
    assertThat(viewHome_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(setGoogleAdvertisingId_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(setGoogleAdvertisingId_event.gaid).isEqualTo(mockData.gaid);
    assertThat(setSiteType_event).isUndefined();

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
- name: viewHome - manualDising
  code: |-
    const mockData = {
    type: "viewHome",
    advanced_event_options: true,
    manualDising: true
    };
    var events = runCode(mockData);

    var viewHome_event = getEvent(events, "viewHome");
    var manualDising_event = getEvent(events, "manualDising");
    assertThat(viewHome_event).isDefined();
    assertThat(manualDising_event).isDefined();

    // Verify that the tag finished successfully.
    assertApi('gtmOnSuccess').wasCalled();
setup: |-
  function getEvent(events, name){
    var evt;
    for(var i=0; i<events.length; i++){
      if(events[i].event === name)
        evt = events[i];
    }
    return evt;
  }
